basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Marcelous Kyles, and I'm an aspiring developer with a passion for coding and lifelong learning. I'm currently enrolled in CodeCrew's full-time program, where I'm honing my skills in software development and learning from experienced professionals in the field. I believe that being a developer is not just a job, but a calling. It's about solving complex problems, creating innovative solutions, and making a positive impact in people's lives. That's why I'm committed to always learning and staying up-to-date with the latest tools and technologies in the tech industry. My ultimate goal is to become a skilled and versatile developer who can make a meaningful contribution to the tech industry. Whether it's building cutting-edge software applications, developing innovative algorithms, or designing intuitive user interfaces, I'm excited about the possibilities that lie ahead.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A website I got to create for a business that sells cookies shaped like salmon. I used Javascript and HTML to create the main paigethat describes the goal of the business and a sales page that shows the times of service for the stores in different locations. It also shows the sales data for each store and it continues to update.

projects.title: Horned Beast
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for creating an app using react that display different kinds of horned creatures and allows the user to vote for their favorite Horned Beasts.

projects.title: Odd Duck Products
projects.description: a project where I had to make a site that display three unigue random products at a time. It generates a new set of three products everytime the user votes for one until the number of votes reaches the maximum. It also keeps track of the number of votes of each product and displays the results in a chart.
